thread.title: BRIEF-Huizhou Speed Wireless to acquire stake in Shenzhen firm for 132.6 mln yuan
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Huizhou Speed Wireless to acquire stake in Shenzhen firm for 132.6 mln yuan | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Huizhou Speed Wireless to acquire stake in Shenzhen firm for 132.6 mln yuan
text:
Sept 28 Huizhou Speed Wireless Technology Co Ltd
* Says plans to acquire 51 percent stake in Shenzhen tech firm for 132.6 million yuan ($20.82 million)in cash
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1h1sOnW
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3690 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
